characters.name: Naruto Uzumaki
characters.description: A young ninja with big dreams of becoming the Hokage.

characters.name: Sasuke Uchiha
characters.description: A highly skilled ninja with a tragic past.

characters.name: Sakura Haruno
characters.description: A ninja who is skilled in medical jutsu and passionate about becoming strong.

characters.name: Kakashi Hatake
characters.description: A laid-back but powerful ninja, known for his Sharingan eye.

characters.name: Luffy Monkey D.
characters.description: The rubber-bodied pirate who seeks the One Piece.

characters.name: Zoro Roronoa
characters.description: A swordsman who uses three swords in battle.

characters.name: Nami
characters.description: A skilled navigator and thief, and a member of the Straw Hat Pirates.

characters.name: Usopp
characters.description: A sniper and a skilled liar, who dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea.

characters.name: Sanji
characters.description: A talented cook and martial artist, known for his strong legs.

characters.name: Violet Beauregarde
characters.description: A bratty girl who turns into a giant blueberry.

characters.name: Goku
characters.description: A Saiyan raised on Earth, the protagonist of Dragon Ball.

characters.name: Vegeta
characters.description: The proud Saiyan prince, initially a rival to Goku.

characters.name: Bulma
characters.description: A brilliant scientist and Goku’s first friend.

characters.name: Shinji Ikari
characters.description: A troubled teen pilot of the giant mecha Evangelion.

characters.name: Asuka Langley Soryu
characters.description: A brash and confident Eva pilot from Germany.

characters.name: Rei Ayanami
characters.description: A mysterious, quiet girl who serves as one of the main Eva pilots.

characters.name: Light Yagami
characters.description: A high school student who gains a supernatural notebook to kill anyone.

characters.name: L Lawliet
characters.description: A brilliant but eccentric detective trying to stop Light Yagami.

characters.name: Edward Elric
characters.description: A talented alchemist who is searching for the Philosopher’s Stone.

characters.name: Alphonse Elric
characters.description: Edward's younger brother whose soul is trapped in a suit of armor.

characters.name: Isagi Yoichi
characters.description: A forward player in the Blue Lock program, determined to become the best striker.

characters.name: Tanjiro Kamado
characters.description: A kind-hearted young boy who becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered.
